annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Josip Ilicic (Fiorentina) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) tries to find Jose Callejon, but he puts too much power on the pass.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: A dangerous looking corner kick from Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) is cleared to safety by the defence.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Federico Bernardeschi (Fiorentina) overhits the corner kick and none of his teammates can their head on it.

The ball is out of play. Fiorentina win a corner kick. Khouma Babacar (Fiorentina) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a promising strike towards the middle of the goal. Pepe Reina guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Federico Bernardeschi (Fiorentina) takes the corner with a short pass.
Napoli are bossing possession at the moment by exchanging some precise passes from player to player.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Paulo Sousa decides to make a substitution. Nikola Kalinic will be replaced by Riccardo Saponara (Fiorentina).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Dries Mertens makes his way off the pitch and Leonardo Pavoletti (Napoli) comes on as his replacement.

Jose Callejon (Napoli) goes on a mazy run, skips past two defenders and pulls the trigger in front of the keeper. Ciprian Tatarusanu makes a great save to stop the effort going low into the middle of the goal.
Khouma Babacar (Fiorentina) got on the ball on the edge of the box and blazed a first time shot well over the bar.
Cristian Tello (Fiorentina) fashions a shot from the edge of the box after receiving an accurate pass. Pepe Reina makes a stunning save to stop the effort from flying into the bottom right corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. Jorginho is going off and Maurizio Sarri gives the last tactical orders to Amadou Diawara (Napoli).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Marko Rog (Napoli) replaces Marek Hamsik.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Dries Mertens (Napoli) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low inside the right post. It's 4:1.

Marek Hamsik (Napoli) receives a low pass just outside the box and unleashes a fine strike towards the bottom right corner. Ciprian Tatarusanu pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill, indeed.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Josip Ilicic (Fiorentina) scores! He latches on to a pass and produces a perfect strike from the edge of the box that goes inside the left post and past the goalkeeper.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Nicola Rizzoli shows a yellow card to Matias Vecino (Fiorentina), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The ball goes out for a corner. Napoli can continue in their attacking effort.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Dries Mertens (Napoli) meets a cross from a well taken corner kick and fires home. His effort goes into the bottom left corner and hits the net.
Marek Hamsik (Napoli) finds himself in a promising position after receiving a precise pass. He pulls the trigger but only hits one of the opposition, who gets in the way of his effort.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) plays a dangerous chip pass into the box in an attempt to set up one of his teammates, but the effort is intercepted by one of the defenders.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Federico Bernardeschi (Fiorentina) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.
A pass into the penalty area from Federico Bernardeschi (Fiorentina) is intercepted by the defence. Fiorentina force a corner. They send men into the box.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Paulo Sousa prepares a substitution. Sebastian Cristoforo is replaced by Cristian Tello (Fiorentina).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: We are about to witness a substitution. Khouma Babacar (Fiorentina) is replacing Maximiliano Olivera.
Nikola Kalinic (Fiorentina) collects a sweet pass on the edge of the box and in one movement smashes a shot in on goal, but it balloons high over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Federico Bernardeschi (Fiorentina) works the corner short.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Kalidou Koulibaly (Napoli) has tested the patience of referee Nicola Rizzoli and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
Nikola Kalinic (Fiorentina) receives a precise pass and threatens the keeper with a long range shot. His attempt goes miles wide of the left post.
Federico Bernardeschi (Fiorentina) sends a cross into the box, but Pepe Reina comes off his line to gather the ball.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half gets underway.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Nicola Rizzoli has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Raul Albiol (Napoli) receives a yellow card for a nasty tackle.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: This corner kick is taken with a short pass by Federico Bernardeschi (Fiorentina).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) receives a well taken defence splitting pass inside the box and scores! He buries the ball into the bottom left corner.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) receives a pass and decides to smash the ball from long range. His poor effort sails well wide of the right post.

Marek Hamsik (Napoli) connected with a pass around the edge of the box, aimed and shot. His attempt went low towards the middle of the target, but Ciprian Tatarusanu was alert and the score remained the same.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Federico Bernardeschi (Fiorentina) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear.

Josip Ilicic (Fiorentina) wasted a huge opportunity! The fans already began to celebrate as he unleashed a powerful shot from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort. The ball went towards the bottom left corner, but Pepe Reina made a crucial save! Now Fiorentina have a corner.
Piotr Zielinski (Napoli) plays a through ball but overhits it.

What a great touch by Dries Mertens (Napoli)! He picks up a precise pass on the edge of the box and immediately unleashes a shot on goal. His effort, however, only rattles the right post. What an unlucky moment for him.
Some neat passing and movement from Fiorentina as they ping around some short passes in order to create a new attacking opportunity.

Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) and his stunning dribble! He zig zags through the defence and gets in front of the keeper. He faints to shoot and then suddenly strikes goalwards, but his effort misses the target by a whisker. Very unlucky for Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli). This could have been a legendary goal.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) attempts to send over a cross in order to find one of his teammates, but an opposition defender averts the danger by intercepting the effort.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) received a clever through ball which could have put him in a promising position, but the defence was alert to the danger.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Kalidou Koulibaly (Napoli) fires the rebound low into the middle of the goal after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 1:0.
Marek Hamsik (Napoli) jumps inside the box to meet the corner and aims a header towards the right post, but the goalkeeper pulls off an astonishing save to deny him.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Napoli.
Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) dinks a cross into the box in an attempt to find one of his teammates, but the defence manages to clear.

Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) holds his head in his hands after missing a big chance. He latches on to a rebound, creates some space from himself and fires the ball from the edge of the box well wide of the right post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) is cleared by the opposition's defence.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) tries to latch onto a through ball, but it's too long.
Nicola Rizzoli blows his whistle for a foul after Milan Badelj (Fiorentina) hacks down one of his opponents.
Neat passing move from Napoli in order to create new attacking opportunities.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
Napoli will kick off.
The referee of today's match will be Nicola Rizzoli.
